entry.string: The HTML module is a utility module for setting allowed HTML tags.
entry.translation: De HTML module is een utility module om te bepalen welke HTML tags zijn toegestaan.

entry.string: Using the administration menu, you are allowed to view and set allowed HTML tags. You can also add new tags, edit current tags and delete tags from the system.
There are no included blocks with this module.
entry.translation: Er zijn geen blokken meegeleverd bij deze module.

entry.string: Two types of Transform hooks are provided. These are for generating linebreaks. Either use the simple, or smart linebreak transform. This will transform text with linebreaks in the text into html text with <br /> tags. Please note, if you do not want linebreaks, do not hook this module to another. The transform hook only affects linebreaks and not the allowed HTML of the module.
The core tag registration needs to be completely re-thought to allow this module to act as a transform rather than just a matter of setting a configuration variable.
entry.translation: De hoofd tag registratie moet compleet over bedacht worden om deze module te laten werken als een wijzigings module i.p.v. de huidige werking als een configuratie module voor variabelen.

entry.string: Further information on the HTML module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on HTML module found at
